putter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a type of golf club (=stick), used to hit the ball a short distance towards or into the hole
putter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to spend time doing things that are not very important in a relaxed way
putter.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I puttered around for a while, cleaning up the kitchen.
putter.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to walk or move slowly and without hurrying
putter.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: A little boy puttered along the sidewalk.
putter.translation[1].definitions[2].def: to make the low sound that a vehicle makes when it is moving slowly
